name: Fool's Treasure
description:
Fool’s Treasure is a surprising and delightful text-based adventure game, with a focus on story, choice, and exploration. As you travel to different islands at sea, you work to discover artifacts and collect treasure to become a real adventurer, with some perils along the way.

A game by Hurricane Rock Studios:

  • David Mahany
  • Griffin Atchue
  • Quinn Sakala
  • Yash Patel
